Package org.restlet.engine.local

Supports local connectors and resources.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClapClientHelper Connector to the resources accessed via class loaders.
DirectoryServerResource Resource supported by a set of context representations (from file system, class loaders and webapp context).
Entity Represents a local entity, for example a regular file or a directory.
EntityClientHelper Connector to the local entities.
FileClientHelper Connector to the file resources accessible.
FileEntity Local entity based on a regular File.
LocalClientHelper Connector to the local resources accessible via file system, class loaders and similar mechanisms.
ZipClientHelper ZIP and JAR client connector.
ZipEntryEntity Local entity based on an entry in a Zip archive.
ZipEntryRepresentation An entry in a Zip/JAR file.
 

Package org.restlet.engine.local Description

Supports local connectors and resources.

Since:
Restlet 2.0
